sections.title: Grafana Strategy, Advisory & Implementation
sections.description: Appscode’s Grafana consultants help you design and implement a scalable observability strategy. From setting up Grafana across hybrid or cloud-native environments to optimizing dashboards, we ensure your teams get actionable insights faster.
offerings: End-to-end deployment and configuration of Grafana for your infrastructure and applications.
Custom dashboard creation to visualize performance, cost, and reliability metrics.
Best practices for setting up transparent, alert-driven observability systems.

sections.title: Integrate & Visualize Data from Multiple Sources
sections.description: Connect and monitor metrics from any data source including Prometheus, InfluxDB, Elasticsearch, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and more — all in a single Grafana view.
offerings: Consulting on data source integration and observability best practices.
Setup of multi-source dashboards for full-stack visibility.
Custom visualizations for different teams and business objectives.
Centralized data exploration for real-time monitoring.

sections.title: Grafana Reporting & Scheduled Insights
sections.description: Appscode enables teams to transform dashboards into meaningful reports — making observability insights available to all stakeholders.
offerings: Design and automate visual reports and PDF dashboards.
Schedule and share reports across teams via email or chat tools like Slack.
Empower decision-makers with clear, actionable metrics and trends.

sections.title: Real-Time Alerts & Incident Response
sections.description: Detect and respond to performance anomalies before they impact your users. Appscode helps you configure alerting pipelines to automate incident response.
offerings: Define alerting thresholds and connect to tools like PagerDuty or Slack.
Configure alert routing and escalation policies.
Enable multi-environment alert management for faster recovery.
Integrate alerting with DevOps workflows for continuous feedback.
